name: Dubois County Airport Authority
about: The Dubois County Airport Authority flying school, located at the Huntingburg Regional Airport, offers comprehensive flight training programs for individuals of all ages, from 14 to 80+. Our experienced Certified Flight Instructors (CFIs) provide training in both high-wing Cessna and low-wing Piper aircraft. We offer private pilot licenses, with options to rent the same aircraft used for training. Additional services include accelerated ground school, aircraft maintenance, and fueling. Our facility boasts a full-service FBO, hangar space, and corporate aircraft management. With a newly upgraded 5,501' x 100' paved runway and a range of amenities, we are dedicated to providing top-notch aviation education and services. Contact us to start your flying journey today.
services:
